article.title: List_of_Dune_characters
article.paragraph: DISPLAYTITLE:List of ''Dune'' charactersThis is a list of the characters who appear in the novels of the fictionalDune (franchise)'''''Dune''''' universe, created byFrank Herbertand later expanded byBrian HerbertandKevin J. Anderson.

This article provides links to many of the main characters in theDuneuniverse. They are grouped by primary allegiances. In some cases these allegiances change or reveal themselves to be different throughout the novels.
article.heading: House Atreides

list.listitem: Vorian Atreides, the founder of the house; son of theTitan (Dune)TitanAgamemnon (Dune)Agamemnon

Siona Atreides, daughter of Moneo
